# Allow all search engines to crawl the site
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow crawling of API routes and internal files
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /admin/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://hazemalmelli.vercel.app/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay (optional, helps prevent server overload)
Crawl-delay: 10
